posts.post_title: t206 Bob Rhoades PSA 5 (Hands at chest)
posts.post_content: I am selling a PSA 5 Bob Rhoades, hands at chest.  My price is SOLD delivered.  The card is a Piedmont back 350 Subjects.  Thanks for your consideration.

Joe,
I sent you a p.m.
Thanks
George Gogol
